00045 // Next two #defines used to be in XVMatrix.cc, but should be here.
00046 #define NO_BOUNDS_CHECK
00047 //#define CHECKSIZE(m,msg) /* do nothing */
00048 
00049 #define FR_EPSFCN 1.0E-16       // FrReal is the type of the matrices
00050 #define FrReal double           // FR_EPSFCN is the minimum available value
00051 
00052 extern void _panic(char *);     // For simple exception handling.
00053 
00054 typedef struct {                // Data structure for reference counts
00055   FrReal *data;
00056   int refCount;
00057 } RefCounter;
00058 
00060 #ifndef CHECKSIZE
00061 #define CHECKSIZE(m,mess) \
00062 {if ((m.rowNum != rowNum) || (m.colNum != colNum)) _panic(mess);}
00063 #endif
00064 
00068 class _rowvec
00069 {
00070 private:
00071   FrReal *data;
00072   int colNum;
00073 
00074 public:
00075 
00076   _rowvec(FrReal *datain,int ncols) {data = datain; colNum = ncols;}
00077 
00078   FrReal&
00079   operator[] (int n) {
00080     if ((n < 0) || (n >= colNum))
00081       _panic("XVMatrix second argument out of range");
00082     return data[n];
00083   }
00084 
00085   const FrReal&
00086   operator[] (int n) const {
00087     if ((n < 0) || (n >= colNum))
00088       _panic("XVMatrix second argument out of range");
00089     return data[n];
00090   }
00091 
00092 };

00100 // The XVMatrix class definition starts here
00101 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 //*
00103 //* XVMatrix.h
00104 //*
00105 //* 02/20/95 Gregory D. Hager
00106 //* 
00107 //* Header file for a XVMatrix package for small systems
00108 //* A simple matrix package for small applications.  Matrices are stored in
00109 //* row-major order using a ragged-array data structure.  Submatrices are
00110 //* also supported as are row and column vectors.
00111 //*
00112 //* Bounds checking and size checking are also included by default.
00113 //* Defining the NO_BOUNDS_CHECK turns off bounds checking.
00114 //* Defining check_size turns off size checking on matrix operations.
00115 //* Check in XVMatrix.cc at the start of the file to see whether
00116 //* NO_BOUNDS_CHECK or CHECKSIZE are defined as you would like them to be.
00117 //*
00118 //* The SUBSCRIPT_START_WITH_1 preprocessor variable, if defined,
00119 //* allows you to index these structures from 1 to n, rather than from
00120 //* 0 to n-1.
00121 //*
00122 //* Matrices should be templates, but for some reason templates aren't
00123 //* working so I'll just hardcode the type for now.
00124 //*
00125 //* This header file contains the definitions for the classes
00126 //* _rowvec, XVRowVector, XVColumnVector, XVMatrix, and XVDiagonalMatrix
00127 //*
00128 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00129

00134   friend class XVDiagonalMatrix;
